Posts.Content: Jun 23, 2008 11:06PM LFarbs wrote: Jenny, Please know that you are not alone. You have us and it is okay to be scared, you have every right. You  will get through this and we will be here waiting to hear from you. I know it is not the same as physical comfort, but still very real. I went through my diagnosis waiting period with very much anxiety as I have no family and my husband is in Iraq. I did not want to tell him anything until I had the results of the biopsy. If I had not found this board to gain strength and knowledge from reading all the messages it would have been much more nerve wracking. Even though I never posted I found great comfort from the fantastic women (and men) on these discussion boards. Hugs to you and don't be afraid to ask your dr. for something to help you relax a little during this very tough time.
Posts.Title: Duct Excison Next Week Starting to Panic BIG TIME QueenK lisa39
